name: @dddappp/ao-cli
description: Universal AO CLI tool for testing and automating AO dApps (replaces AOS REPL)

scripts.prepublishOnly: node -c ao-cli.js && echo '✅ Syntax check passed' && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json')); fs.writeFileSync('version.js', 'module.exports = ' + JSON.stringify(pkg.version) + ';'); console.log('✅ Version file generated:', pkg.version);"

author: dddappp
